description: This file defines the AppGatewayClient class which provides a wrapper to call the org.rdk.AppGateway.respond method via an RPC mechanism. It exposes a method to send responses with specific consumer context information.

classes.name: AppGatewayClient
classes.description: A class that wraps calls to org.rdk.AppGateway.respond, providing an asynchronous method to respond with a given consumer context and payload.

methods.name: async respond(consumerCtx: ConsumerContext, payload: unknown): Promise<void> { respond
methods.description: Calls the org.rdk.AppGateway.respond method with the provided consumer context and payload by invoking the RPC callback.
